posts.title: Marylin Monroe pornography
posts.excerpt: Many famous stars began their career in pornography, Marilyn Monroe being one of the greatest examples, who when financially stable declared she no longer had to gratify the sexual demands of studio executives. posts._title: Bruno Mattei – Emanuelle fuga dall’inferno AKA Emanuelle In Prison (1983)
posts.title: Emanuelle fuga dall’inferno
posts.excerpt: From the net: While four male convicts are being held temporarily in a women’s prison, they succeed in taking a group hostage and demand their freedom. The district attorney retaliates by forming a select squad to eliminate the troublemakers and a bloody battle ensues.

posts._title: Peter Brosens & Jessica Woodworth – La cinquième saison AKA The Fifth Season (2012)
posts.title: La cinquième saison
posts.excerpt: Quote: Winter, spring, summer, autumn…and then? La cinquiememe saison (The Fifth Season) is an apocalyptic tale which does not need to make use of extraterrestrial aliens or natural catastrophes to impress the viewer.
